      • deleteDir

        public static boolean deleteDir(java.io.File dir)
        Deletes all files and subdirectories under "dir".
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory to be deleted
        Returns:
        boolean Returns "true" if all deletions were successful. If a deletion fails, the method stops attempting to delete and returns "false".

      • changeFileSuffix

        public static java.lang.String changeFileSuffix(java.io.File filename,
                                java.lang.String newSuffix)

      • changeFileSuffix

        public static java.lang.String changeFileSuffix(java.lang.String filename,
                                java.lang.String newSuffix)
        Given a filename, whether relative or absolute, it substitutes the suffix for a newSuffix. If current filename does not contain suffix, newSuffix is appended at the end Note that this method is able to handle absolute paths with dots in the middle of the parent directories.
        Parameters:
        filename -
        newSuffix -
        Returns:
        file with the new suffix
